1: <pb/><t>'Oltac wal eb' waync cob'i', palta xoj smitz'tz'ec' snab'en eb' snani tas maysch'olnilal 'oj sb'o eb', ax yic tzsacb' 'eli, tzyamn 'och eb' sb'on tas tzna cha, yujto 'ayc' 'a yol sc'ab' eb' sb'oni.</t>
2: <t>Toto tznib'j 'och eb' slum junc yit 'anma'il, tojln̈ej sto'n 'ec' eb', toto tznib'j 'och eb' junc n̈a, tojln̈ej yi'n 'ec' eb'. 'Ixta wal tz'aj yixtx eb' mamb'il yet' yunnal.</t>
3: <t>Yuj cha, tzyaln Jehová 'ixtic: An̈jtona 'in, 'ay pax tas tzin na 'a e patc ax tic. 'Oj wa't junc niwquil yailal 'a e cal, man̈x 'oj stac' e coln e b'a 'a 'a. Man̈x 'oj stac' e b'an̈n e b'a eyeq'ui, yujto stiempoal yailal.</t>
4: <t>A 'a yic jun c'ul cha, 'oj stz'ac b'itnc sb'a eb' 'ajc'ojl yuj ex sb'uchni. 'Oj yal eb' 'ixtic: A wal ticnec, caw wal on̈ lajwec 'el 'a jun 'ejmn̈ej, a qui chon̈b'ec to yic Jehová yaji, caw xjelmj mach 'ay yico'. Man̈x 'a mach tztac' stenn 'och wa'an. A eb' on̈ lajnec 'el cha, tox 'ix spojc' eb' qui lumec 'a 'a, 'oj schic eb' 'a sb'it cha, xchi Dios.</t>
5: <t>Yuj e mul, yuj cha, may eyaln eyic 'a e macl 'a scal eb' schon̈b' Jehová.</t>
6: <t>Tzyaln eb' 'anma 'ixtc 'ayin: Man̈ al 'ayn̈ yuj yailal 'oj jawoc, toc wal 'oj jawc jun q'uixwc'ojlal chi 'a quib'n̈ec.</t>
7: <t>Toc catb'tzab'il an̈ yin̈tl on̈ Jacob tic. ¿Tom xlajw sniwnc'ojlal Dios, yuj cha, 'ixta wal 'oj on̈ yutquec? xchi eb'. Yuj cha, tzyaln Jehová 'ixtic: Yel toni, wa'jnac in ti', to wach'n̈j tzwutj in b'a, palta cojn 'a eb' caw tojl tzyutj sb'eyb'al.</t>
8: <t>Ax tic, ex 'och 'ajc'ojlal 'a eb' in chon̈ab'. A eb' tzmeltzj paxt 'a owal, a snan eb' to man̈x 'a tas 'oj 'i'nc eb', palta ax xo tzeyij 'ec' spichl eb' to chan̈ stojol.</t>
9: <t>Tze pech 'elt eb' 'ix 'ix 'a yol yatut to 'aych yipc sc'ojol, a smacl eb' 'unn wa'jnac, 'in tzeyij 'ec' 'a jun 'ejmn̈ej.</t>
10: <t>Q'uen̈ec wa'an, 'ixquec. Man̈x smojc 'ayx 'ec' 'a tic, yujto til wal maysch'olnil x'el e b'on 'a sat lum lum tic, yuj cha, tox xjuw 'el lum 'a jun 'ejmn̈ej.</t>
11: <t>Ax tic, a junc checb' to caw wal 'a'm 'es, a tze nib'ej, atn junc mach tzaln 'eli chajtlto caw niwn eyal uva yet' eyan̈ 'oj eyic'.</t>
12: <t>'Icha tzyutj junc 'ilm calnelu smolb'tzan no calnelu 'a yol scolal, 'ixta 'oj ex wutc ex in molb'tzan cot e masnil ex yin̈tl Jacob, atn ex israel to 'oj to e cani. 'Icha junc lum 'a'lic b'ut'jnac 'el yuj no calnelu, 'ixta wal 'oj 'aj sb'ut'j pax 'el e lum eyu'uj.</t>
13: <t>An e Diosal in tic, 'oj in b'ab'lj eyu'uj, yuj in jacn e b'e, ax eyoch tza'n wu'uj. 'Oj eyelcn 'a sti 'el spuertail chon̈ab', 'ixta 'oj eyaj e colchjcan 'eli. An Jehová in, e Reyl in, an b'ab'l in eyu'uj, xchi Dios.</t>
